turnStructure.description: Player 1 and Player 2 each select one character card to add to their battle zone. The two cards attack each other immediately.
Both players add another card to their battle zone, then choose attack targets. Players can also opt to discard cards back into their deck.
Both players add a third card. Now, each card chooses its attack target from the opponent’s battle zone. Players may also return cards from the battle zone to their deck.

rules: A character card can be combined with an action card if their elements match (for element actions) or classes match (for class actions).
Healing cards can target other cards in your battle zone.
If a card reaches 0 HP, it is discarded permanently.

attackRules.targetSelection: Player selects a target from opponent's battle zone
attackRules.attackPriority: Characters attack first, then action cards

bonuses.elementBonus: Damage boost if attacker has advantage over target
bonuses.classBonus: Bonus if class synergy is met

cardDestructionRules.effect: If HP reaches threshold, card is removed from battle zone

validTargetRules: Cards can only attack cards in the opponent’s battle zone.
A character cannot attack another character of the same element.
actionCardInteractions: Action cards can be played at any time but require a valid match to remain in play.
A character card cannot be played if there is an unmatched action card in the battle zone.
battleZoneInteractions: If a card has a class, at least one god in the battle zone must share that class.
If a card has an element, at least one god in the battle zone must share that element.
